wordFromCEO.title: Words from Our CEO
wordFromCEO.heading: You've chosen <span class="text-muted">a wonderful, bright and fruitful career.
wordFromCEO.content: Are you interested in becoming a skilled CNA? Have you thought about enhancing your skills in caring for your love ones or starting a new career? If so, you've come to the right website. We'll explain the requirements and steps for becoming a CNA then walk you through the necessary requirements and procedures to reach your goal as a qualified CNA

evening.heading: EVENING CNA COURSE
evening.content: Are you interested in becoming a skilled CNA? Have you thought about enhancing your skills in caring for your love ones or starting a new career? If so, you've come to the right website. We'll explain the requirements and steps for becoming a CNA then walk you through the necessary requirements and procedures to reach your goal as a qualified CNA

weekend.heading: WEEKEND CNA COURSE
weekend.content: For those who are able to attend classes only on Saturdays, ACT offers a Saturday CNA course. These classes are held in the morning from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.

phlebotomyEkg.heading: PHLEBOTOMY & EKG
phlebotomyEkg.content: ACT course is approved by the American Phlebotomy Association. Course covers the topics necessary for becoming a proficient Phlebotomist.
